00003 import java.util.Vector;

00005 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00006 import newtonERP.orm.associations.AccessorManager;
00007 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00008 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00009 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00010 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldString;
00011 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldText;
00012 
00017 public class SearchCriteria extends AbstractOrmEntity
00018 {
00021         public SearchCriteria()
00022         {
00023                 super();
00024                 setVisibleName("Critère de rercherche");
00025                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new SearchCriteriaOperator());
00026                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new SearchEntity());
00027         }
00028 
00029         @Override
00030         public Fields initFields()
00031         {
00032                 FieldString key = new FieldString("Nom de clef", "key");
00033                 key.setNaturalKey(true);
00034 
00035                 FieldInt specOperator = new FieldInt("Opérateur",
00036                                 new SearchCriteriaOperator().getForeignKeyName());
00037                 specOperator.setNaturalKey(true);
00038 
00039                 FieldText value = new FieldText("Valeur", "value", false);
00040                 value.setNaturalKey(true);
00041 
00042                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00043                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00044                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Entité de recherche", new SearchEntity()
00045                                 .getForeignKeyName()));
00046                 fieldList.add(key);
00047                 fieldList.add(specOperator);
00048                 fieldList.add(value);
00049                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00050         }
00051 
00055         public String getKey()
00056         {
00057                 return (String) getData("key");
00058         }
00059 
00063         public String getValue()
00064         {
00065                 return getDataString("value");
00066         }
00067 
00071         public String getOperator()
00072         {
00073                 return getOperatorEntity().getOperator();
00074         }
00075 
00076         private SearchCriteriaOperator getOperatorEntity()
00077         {
00078                 return (SearchCriteriaOperator) getSingleAccessor(new SearchCriteriaOperator()
00079                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00080         }
00081 }
